paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted BRCA2 variant information and penetrance data from a study on BRCA1/2-associated cancer in Latin America.

patients.demographics: 3 in Brazil, 2 in Mexico, 1 in Colombia

individual_records.evidence_sentence: Regarding BRCA2, only a Colombian founder variant was recurrent: c.2808_2811del (n=6: 3 in Brazil, 2 in Mexico and 1 in Colombia).

functional_data.summary: Functional impact not detailed in the paper.

variants.additional_notes: This variant was noted as recurrent among the population studied.
key_quotes: Regarding BRCA2, only a Colombian founder variant was recurrent: c.2808_2811del (n=6: 3 in Brazil, 2 in Mexico and 1 in Colombia).

extraction_metadata.notes: Only one BRCA2 variant was reported in the paper.
